text: Nikhubakabula tsimbia ekhumi na tsibili, emikanda chaukhane. Ne nikhufimbulila Musa olwa Abandu baye bamusaba amatsi mbu; “khupa lichina nende indabushi yiyio” mana amatsi nikarundukha okhurula mwichina elo, nikekhola tsindoto ekhumi natsibili, ne buli Omundu namanya habundu waye wokhunywa. Nikhubakholela eshinikha shiamaleesi, ne nikhubeshilia Mana nende Salwa. (Nikhubaboolela); “Mulie ebilayi biakhubakabilekhwo bino” Shibakholela efwe obubii tawe halali abeene nibo bekholela obubii
